properties.name: dc_title
properties.description: A name given to the resource

properties.name: dc_coverage
properties.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant

properties.name: dc_identifier
properties.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context

properties.name: dc_format
properties.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource

properties.name: dc_type
properties.description: The nature or genre of the resource

properties.name: dc_creator
properties.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource

properties.name: dc_contributor
properties.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

properties.name: dc_date
properties.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource

properties.name: dc_publisher
properties.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available

properties.name: dc_rights
properties.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource

properties.name: dc_source
properties.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived
